infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_infinitemag: This is a ludicrously cheaty item. It's infinite, it's universal, and it's not at all balanced. Oh, and the bullets explode.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_10-22magazine: A rotary magazine of 10 .22 LR cartridges.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_saiga12mag_bs: A magazine of buckshot shells for use in a Saiga 12.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_saiga12mag_fl: A magazine of flechette shells for use in a Saiga 12.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_saiga12mag_in: A magazine of incendiary shells for use in a Saiga 12.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_saiga12mag_sl: A magazine of slug shells for use in a Saiga 12.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_m82mag: A magazine of 5 regular .50 BMG rounds for use in a Barrett M82.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_m82mag_ap: A magazine of 5 armor-piercing .50 BMG rounds for use in a Barrett M82.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_m82mag_i: A magazine of 5 incendiary .50 BMG rounds for use in a Barrett M82.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_greasegunmag: A magazine for the Grease Gun.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_musketball: A smooth ball of iron for use in a musket.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_50bmg: A high power .50 caliber cartridge for use in a Barrett M82.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_50bmg_ap: A high power armor-piercing .50 caliber cartridge for use in a Barrett M82.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_50bmg_i: A high power incendiary .50 caliber cartridge for use in a Barrett M82.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_30-06round: A .30-06 Springfield round for the M1 Garand.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_flechetteshell: A 12ga shell filled with tiny needles that tear through flesh, causing massive bleeding.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_incendiaryshell: A 12ga shell filled with incendiary pellets that explode on contact.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_slugshell: A 12ga containing a large, singular metal pellet that effectively penetrates armor.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_45revolverround: A revolver round for the .45 Revolver.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_45revolverroundexp: An explosive-tipped revolver round for the .45 Revolver.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_40mmrubberbullet: A less-lethal 40mm grenade that stuns a single target effectively.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_45revolver: A .45 caliber revolver for use in close quarters combat. Effective against armored targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_reallybigiron: To the town of Agua Fria rode a stranger one fine day, Hardly spoke to folks around him didn't have too much to say, No one dared to ask his business no one dared to make a slip, For the stranger there among them had a big iron on his hip.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_glock17: A reliable polymer-framed 9mm pistol excellent for use against human targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_zip22: A semi-automatic bullpup pistol so bad it killed a company. Known for malfunctions, poor design, and being generally terrible, this gun has a special place in history through how immensely awful it was.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_eokapistol: A crudely assembled 20mm cartridge attached to a 'handle' with wire.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_makeshiftshotgun: A DIY shotgun crudely hammered out of metal pipe, 'designed' to take 12ga shells. Probably not a good idea to put this next to your face.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_musket: A simple muzzle-loaded smoothbore rifle vastly outmatched by modern weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_m82: A devastating semi-automatic rifle chambered in .50 BMG. Extremely deadly, and can take out most of Europa's hostile life in just a few shots.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_m1garand: A semi-automatic battle rifle used in Earth wars hundreds of years ago. Known for its distinctive ejection sound.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_milkormgl: A lightweight 40mm grenade launcher with six chambers. Originally developed back on Earth, it serves well for warfare.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_ak47: The Avtomat Kalashnikova is a well known rifle, designed over 300 years ago but remaining relevant even now. A reliable, cheap, fully-automatic rifle firing 7.62x39mm cartridges, it's cemented its place in history in the arms of revolutionaries.
infotexts.entitydescription.vgm_g11: A prototype assault rifle firing 4.73x33mm caseless ammunition.
